doc.title: Guide to NetKernelROC XUnit assertion library
doc.desc: Provides a set of XUnit assertions

doc.title: HTTP protocol assertions
doc.desc: Performs HTTP assertions such as headers, return codes, etc.

doc.title: CSS content assertions
doc.desc: Uses a CSS Selector to validate a XML resource

doc.title: CSS-Selector license
doc.desc: License for the CSS-Selector being used

doc.title: Image content assertions
doc.desc: Performs assertions on an image such as height, width and color

doc.title: Image equality assertions
doc.desc: Compares two images to see if they are equivalent
